title: Chat Restriction and losing bonuses
body:
So, my account can now no longer earn chests/key fragments because a group of friends decided to report me all together. You may be wondering why I was reported.. well during champ select in the banning phase I banned Malphite. Immediately after they all started raging at me because their top player wanted to play him. I had Twisted Fate hovered in mid and their top player is 2 picks before, he locks TF (Twisted Fate) and says that he is mid now because I banned his champ so he takes mine. So I'm forced into top lane, where I went because I'm not giong to stoop to their level. Over the course of the game they wouldn't leave me alone when I lost my lane and just continuously bashed me telling me they were going to report me and spamming all chat "Report Darius he's trolling." So not only did I get my lane stolen, I had to play a lane I didn't queue for and had a bad game at that, as well as the guy that stole my position ALSO doing horrible in the lane phase. So I think it is a little unfair that I get my rewards taken away by a group of friends queued together because they have the numbers in the end game to report me enough to just force a chat restriction on me through. Now because of the chat restriction.. I can no longer earn rewards.. I can't earn rewards because someone stole my lane. Seems fair overall.

Give me your thoughts.

replies.body:
> because a group of friends decided to report me all together

That won't result in you getting punished. Punishment is calculated per match, not per report, so even 9 reports have roughly no more weight in a single match than one.

https://ask.fm/RiotLyte/answers/133766694594

https://ask.fm/RiotLyte/answers/133759089858

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/player-behavior/reports-how-do-they-work

Whatever your punishment was for, it was legitimate and not because some people joke reported you. Post your reform card?
How can I pull the reform card up, I've been off said chat restriction for a day now.
It would've been emailed to you as well. If you already deleted it, you could submit a [Support Ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and request it be sent again.

My chat logs are here, hard to tell what's going on with out the view of every summoner in the game, which was jungle, and mid against me. All in all our 25 minute game was a chat filled festivity. For the past couple months I have kept my cool completely in games.. especially since the upcoming rewards and such. I'm sure anyone would be a little on edge when, in the new champ select of course you get a position stolen, which is just opposite of the goal the new champ select was going for. I know what I did wrong, but what I did in retrospect is just not put in fair light when you have people that just play ranked to mess with people. Nevertheless thanks for your time!

Hi Mr.High elo / I see you in featured games here and there.

Group reports against you don't do anything if you didn't say antyhing bad. The punishment system isn't based on # of reports you recieve, by rather the # of games you were "validly" reported. 

Also, sucking /= trolling. Even though you are a top tier player, you can still be "bad". Intentional feeding / trolling is not he same as being bad here and there, and being bad won't get you punished. Ruining other's game with that as a purposeful intent is.
